website_summaries.verdict: Entry-level machine aimed at beginners and lower-level players. Lower price point than many tennis ball machines.
pros: A machine better suited to novice players
Lower-than-average price for an automatic tennis ball machine
May set topspin or backspin for balls
Remote control unit available as a separate purchase
One of the lighter machines on the market at around 35 pounds
cons: Limited control options over the exit angle and spin of the balls

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Is Short, Customer Service Is Good Though : AMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I'm down to about 45 minutes on court. I called customer service, and it was basically hassle free for them to put a new battery in. I borrowed my friend's machine which is why I bought this one and never had a problem. If they fix it and it goes away the review will increase to 5 stars. AMENDMENT: After only a few months after replacing the battery, the time on court is down to 45 minutes again. They advertise 2-4 hours. It's not that long. It's pretty frustrating at this point since after 45 minutes I'm just getting warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It's Improved My Game
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Elite Liberty for almost 3 years and have used it an average of once a week, sometimes twice. I didn't buy the remote and don't feel I need it. When turned on, the machine gives you 20 sec. to get to the other side before it starts firing balls -- plenty of time. I buy pressureless balls online from WalMart with in-store delivery. I've been very pleased with the machine's durability and reliability. Admittedly, $1,000 for a ball machine seems pricey to me, but all good ball machines are expensive. If you ever have a question about the machine, Losbster's customer hot line folks are very helpful. Most importantly, it's really improved my game.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: My First Tennis Ball Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have used this machine for about one year and have been happy with it. It has never jammed despite shooting thousands of balls during this time. Customer service was excellent for two problems I had after purchasing it. The only design problem with the unit is the tall handle which makes it difficult to transport in a regular car trunk. On the other hand, it is relatively light, and the handle makes it very easy to move the machine around the court and on other paved surfaces. I use only pressureless balls as recommended by Lobster. It's a good machine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Good so far

product_meta.title: Lobster Sports – Elite Liberty Battery Operated Tennis Ball Machine – Lightweight – Large Wheels - Full-Featured Tennis Ball Thrower – Oscillation – Spin – 2-4 hr Runtime – Charger Included
product_meta.description: For the passionate tennis player, student, or family seeking a lightweight tennis ball machine with impressive features, the Lobster Sports elite liberty is an affordable solution. Holding 150 tennis balls, the elite liberty is an easy-to-use ball launcher with a sleek design and great features - all at an amazing price. Developed to meet the needs of beginners who seek advanced control of both ball speed and ball spin, the elite liberty offers unequaled spin control for a machine at this price point. Along with ball speeds of 10 to 70 miles per hour, manual elevation from 0 to 50 degrees, and both topspin and backspin, the ball machine offers exceptional features such as full corner-to-corner random oscillation, and 50-degree lobs for practicing overheads. The ball feed rate can be set from 2 to 12 seconds, and the machine runs two to four hours on a full battery charge. With a 35-pound ergonomic design, this lightweight tennis ball machine is easy to move on and off the court plus with the inverting hopper and folding handle, it is easy to transport in your car. The 8-inch all-terrain wheels allow for easy movement over gravel, grass, curbs, and all court surfaces. Upright the machine measures 29 x 43 x 15. 5 inches. When folded down it is 29 x 21 x 15. 5 inches. This battery-operated ball machine has been engineered for maximum durability and will last for decades if taken care of properly. Included with the machine is the standard dual-voltage charger (100-240v) with build-in trickle technology to ensure your battery will never overcharge. Average charge time ranges from 12 - 24 hours depending on battery level. Lobster Sports has been making tennis ball machines since 1971 and stands by their machines, which are covered by a 2-Year . Optional accessories for the elite liberty include a 2-function remote control, a premium charger, storage cover, and an external AC power supply - all available from Lobster Sports. To make this model lightweight, the battery is smaller than on other Lobster Sports machines and will provide fewer hours of court time. If you need longer battery life, please consider our elite one model or above. The Lobster Sports elite liberty machine can be a tennis player’s life-long training partner — which makes it an exceptional value with it’s low price and high-end features. A 5% restocking fee will be charged for any returned products.
feature_bullets: ENHANCED FEATURES AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE: Lobster Sports has designed the elite liberty tennis ball machine to challenge beginner level players. It is a uniquely designed, easy-to-use product equipped with enhanced features at an affordable price.

SPIN-CONTROL FEATURE INCLUDED: The elite liberty ball machine also offers unequalled spin control for a machine at this price point. The ball spin can be adjusted for both topspin and backspin and at different levels.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE: Designed for maximum durability, this tennis ball machine has been manufactured to hold up against constant use. The 35-pound ergonomic design makes it lightweight.

EASY TO TRANSPORT: The elite liberty tennis ball machine is easy to transport in your car. Its oversized wheels and 3-foot ergonomic folding handle allow for easy transportation over grass, gravel, and curbs.

VERSATILE TENNIS BALL MACHINE: This tennis ball machine offers manual oscillation, ball speed from 20 to 70 mph, an elevation from 0 to 50 degrees, while its small, lightweight battery is easy to transport, and can operate from two to four hours.
